```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtree)
```

```{r readSVDQuartets}
SVDQuartets<-read.tree("../Data/WildOctoNoHybridsFullTreeFinal.tre")
#SVDQuartets<-read.tree("SVDQuartets.tre")
SVDQuartetsFullRooted<-ape::root.phylo(SVDQuartets,"Rubus_out")
sample_list <- read.delim("../Data/sample_list.csv", sep=",",stringsAsFactors=FALSE,)
names(sample_list)<-c("sample","subspecies")
```

```{r Plot Tree}
Tree1<-ggtree(SVDQuartetsFullRooted,branch.length = "none")%<+% sample_list  + geom_nodelab()+ geom_text(aes(label=subspecies), hjust=-0.2)+geom_cladelabel(node=66, "Fragaria chiloensis \n South American",offset = 2)+ geom_cladelabel(no=69,"Fragaria virginiana",offset=2)+theme(legend.position = "top") 

rotate(Tree1,68)+geom_strip('PI551453','PI551729', "Fragaria chiloensis \n North American", offset=2,offset.text=0.25)

```
